title: Give up, build something silly, dick around for the rest of the match. "Report WW"
body:
**You have been reported for: Offensive language**
**You have been reported for: Verbal Abuse**

**You are chat restricted for 300 games**

I don't think not-really-intentionally-but-not-accidentally feeding doesn't warrant chat restrictions.. This is why going by volume of reports doesn't work. Chat restricting someone when they "troll" is like forbidding a shoplifter from being within a mile of an elementary school. The punishment doesn't fit the crime, not at all.

Not sayin' I didn't deserve to be reported, though. Just sayin' I got reported for the *wrong thing* a lot, so got punished for the *wrong thing*.
